
# List Customer Segments Request

Defines the valid parameters for requests to __ListCustomerSegments__.

## Structure

`ListCustomerSegmentsRequest`

## Fields

| Name | Type | Tags | Description | Getter | Setter |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `cursor` | `?string` | Optional | A pagination cursor returned by previous calls to __ListCustomerSegments__.<br>Used to retrieve the next set of query results.<br><br>See the [Pagination guide](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/pagination) for more information. | getCursor(): ?string | setCursor(?string cursor): void |
